Translations.Text: Olwo nno nebagenda, okutuusa nga bamaze okulinnya eryato (Hidhiri) naalissaako ekituli, (Musa) naagamba nti olitaddeko ekituli ozikirize abantu abalirimu mazima okoze ekintu kibi
(Hidhiri) naagamba nti: saakugambye nti mazima ggwe tojja kusobola kugumiikiriza nga oli nange
(Musa) naagamba nti tonvunaana olw'ekyo kye nneerabidde era tontuusaako olw'ekigambo kyange (eky'okubeera naawe) buzito bwonna
Olwo nno nebagenda okutuusa lwe baasanga omulenzi, (Hidhiri) naamutta (Musa) naagamba nti osse omuntu atalina musango, atalina gwasse, mazima ekintu kyokoze kivve
(Hidhiri) naagamba nti ssaakugambye nti mazima ggwe tojja kusobola kugumiikiriza nga oli nange
(Musa) naagamba nti kenkubuuza ku kintu ekirala kyonna oluvanyuma lwa kino tonzikiriza kubeera naawe, mazima ofunye ensonga ekusonyiyisa ku nze

Nebagenda bombi okutuusa lwe batuuka ku bantu b'omukitundu, nebasaba abantu baamu okubawa emmere naye baagaana okubafuula abagenyi baabwe, wabula baasanga mu kyo (ekitundu) ekisenge nga kyagala kugwa (Hidhiri) naakiddaabiriza (Musa) naagamba nti singa oyagadde waalikisabiddeko empeera (noosasulwa)
(Hidhiri) naagamba nti: wano nze naawe wetwawukanidde, (wabula) ngenda kukubuulira amakulu g'ebyo byotaasobodde kugumiikiriza
Lyo eryato lyabadde, lya ba Masikiini nga bapakasiza ku nnyanja, nagenderedde okulissaako akamogo, anti, mu maaso eyo waabaddeyo Kabaka nga atwala buli lyato eddungi mu ngeri ya bunyazi
Ate yye omulenzi bakaddebe bombi baali bakkiriza, netutya yye (omulenzi) okubatuusaako obuzibu bwokubula n'okukaafuwala
Olwo nno twayagadde Mukama Omulabirizi wa bombi abawaanyisizeemu bombi ekirungi okusinga yye mubutukuvu, era asinga okuba omusaasizi

Ate kyo ekisenge kyabadde kya balenzi babiri bamulekwa mu kibuga (ekyo), wansi waakyo waabaddeyo eby'ogugagga bya bombi era nga Kitaabwe wa bombi yali mulongoofu, olwo nno Mukama omulabiriziwo yayagala bombi okumala okusajjakula, olwo nno baggyeyo eby'obugagga byabwe bombi, ekyo nga kusaasira okuva eri Mukama Omulabiriziwo, era ssaakikoze lwa kusalawo kwange (wabula) bubaka obwavudde eri (Katonda), okwo nno kwe kunnyonnyola byotasobodde kugumiikiriza
